promo.why1: Our predictions are tied to this bookmaker ‚Äî odds, lines and recommendations are calculated for their quotes

guide.title: Beginner's Guide
guide.subtitle: 10 tips to get started
guide.card1Desc: Start with small stakes to learn the process without big risks. Increase stakes as you gain experience.
guide.card2Desc: Losing streaks happen to everyone. Never increase stakes to recover losses ‚Äî stick to your strategy.
guide.card3Desc: AI analyzes real statistics, form, head-to-head and other factors. Use predictions as a starting point for your bets.
guide.card4Desc: We recommend {{name}} ‚Äî fast payouts, high odds and {{bonus}} bonus for new users.
guide.card5Desc: Decide how much you can afford to lose per month. Never bet money you need for essentials.
guide.card6Desc: Odds represent probability. Lower odds = higher probability. Use our Odds Converter in PRO Tools.
guide.card7Desc: Team form, injuries and transfers significantly affect results. Our AI tracks all this automatically.
guide.card8Desc: Never bet more than 5% of your bankroll on a single bet. Use our Bankroll Tracker to stay disciplined.
guide.card9Desc: Track all your bets ‚Äî wins, losses and analysis. This helps you improve. Our Stats page does this automatically.
guide.card10Desc: Profitable betting is a marathon, not a sprint. Focus on making good decisions, not short-term results.
guide.card1Content: Our AI analyzes thousands of matches daily using statistics, form, injuries, and historical data to generate accurate predictions.
guide.card2Content: Each prediction comes with a confidence level (Low/Medium/High) and recommended stake amount based on Kelly Criterion.
guide.card3Content: View detailed match statistics, head-to-head records, team form, and more to make informed decisions.
guide.card4Content: We recommend {{name}} ‚Äî fast payouts, high odds, and a welcome bonus of {{bonus}} for new users.
guide.card5Content: The Value Bet Finder scans odds from bookmakers and identifies bets where the odds are higher than the calculated probability.
guide.card6Content: Track your bankroll, set limits, and manage your betting budget responsibly with our built-in tools.
guide.card7Content: Get instant AI analysis of any match ‚Äî just ask about a team, league, or specific game.
guide.card8Content: Save your favorite leagues and teams to get quick access and personalized predictions.
guide.card9Content: Track all your predictions, see win rates, accuracy by league, and identify your strongest betting areas.
guide.card10Content: Register with our partner, make a deposit, and get instant PRO access with unlimited predictions and all premium tools!

kelly.title: Kelly Calculator
kelly.subtitle: Optimal bet sizing
kelly.criterionDescription: Mathematically optimal bet sizing based on your edge and probability estimate
kelly.oddsHint: The odds offered by the bookmaker
kelly.probabilityHint: Your estimation of the true winning probability
kelly.bankrollHint: Your total betting bankroll for stake calculation
kelly.fractionHint: Half or quarter Kelly is often recommended to reduce variance
kelly.negativeEdge: Kelly suggests not betting ‚Äî negative edge
kelly.step1Desc: Compare your probability estimate to implied odds probability
kelly.step2Desc: Kelly formula tells you exactly how much of your bankroll to bet
kelly.step3Desc: Half or quarter Kelly reduces variance significantly while keeping most of the growth
kelly.proTipText: Only use Kelly when you have a genuine edge. If unsure, bet smaller or skip.

oddsConverter.title: Odds Converter
oddsConverter.americanExplain: American odds show how much you win on $100 bet (positive) or how much to bet to win $100 (negative)
oddsConverter.decimalExplain: Decimal odds show total payout per $1 bet, including your stake
oddsConverter.fractionalExplain: Fractional odds show profit relative to stake (e.g., 5/1 means $5 profit per $1 bet)
oddsConverter.impliedExplain: Implied probability shows the bookmaker's estimated chance of an outcome occurring
